episode_event_hisui_02/4001_1001_0200_10:
(Great... First we end up who-knows-where, and
now we’re stuck in a space-time distortion!)
episode_event_hisui_02/4001_1001_0300_10:
(Akari’s Pokémon are knocked out, and we’ve run
out of items...)
episode_event_hisui_02/4001_1001_0400_10:
(What can we do against these powerful
wild Pokémon?)
episode_event_hisui_02/4001_1001_0600_10: Rei, cover me! I’m taking a chance!
episode_event_hisui_02/4001_1001_0900_10: It looks kind of strange, but...please work!
episode_event_hisui_02/6801_1031_0100_10:
We can be wonderful
sync pairs!
episode_event_hisui_02/6801_1001_0100_10:
This is a place where people and Pokémon walk
alongside each other! We can grow strong here!
episode_event_hisui_02/6801_1001_0200_10: And I want to be a proud sync pair!
episode_event_hisui_02/6801_1001_0400_10:
I’m gonna work even harder in this
new land of Pasio!
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_0900_10:
There was a space-time distortion around
here, right?
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_1200_10: A-are you from a nearby village?!
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_1600_10: Um... Are you Rei and Akari?
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_1700_10: Wha—how do you know our names?!
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_1800_10: Adaman and Irida told us about you two.
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_1900_10:
They said they have friends in Hisui who look just
like us.
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_2100_10:
Yup. They mentioned you when we met a while
back...
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_2400_10:
Ah, sorry to confuse you. Maybe we should start
with introductions, huh?
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_2500_10: I’m Lucas, and this is Dawn.
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_2600_10: We’re from Sinnoh...the Hisui region in the future.
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_2900_10: I see...but how could something like this happen?
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_3200_10: I think the space-time rift brought us here.
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_3300_10: If so, then things make a lot more sense.
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_3500_10:
I don’t remember how I got here this time
either, but...
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_3700_10:
Yeah, that must be it. Adaman and Irida came
here through a space-time rift too.
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_3900_10:
(I haven’t forgotten about the people I met
in Hisui...)
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_4000_10: Both of them are in town, so let’s go see them!
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_4100_10: I think they’ll be happy to see some familiar faces!
episode_event_hisui_02/4002_1001_4200_10: Yeah, that’s true! Please take us to them!
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_0100_10:
I contacted Adaman and Irida, so they should be
here soon...
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_0200_10:
All these huge buildings! And they’re so clean and
sparkly!
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_0300_10:
Here on Pasio, people and Pokémon live together
like it’s normal.
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_0400_10: So this is the future... It’s a little shocking!
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_0500_10:
It’s weird... Even though this is the future, it feels
kinda...familiar?
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_0600_10:
Then...maybe this is the world you originally came
from, Rei!
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_0900_10: I’m not actually from Hisui. Or the time it existed...
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_1000_10:
A space-time rift sent me to Hisui from
somewhere else. So this has happened to me
before.
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_1200_10:
Actually, Adaman and Irida were saying there was
someone who came through a space-time rift...
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_1300_10:
So it’s come full circle, and you’ve made it back to
your original world, like Akari said?
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_1500_10:
My memory is faint, but this world still feels a bit
different.
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_1800_10:
I’m used to being part of the Galaxy Team’s
Survey Corps now!
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_1900_10:
The, uh, “Galaxy Team” back in your time is
surveying Pokémon in the Hisui region, right?
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_2000_10:
That’s right! So you already know all about it!
People from all different regions have come
together, just like on Pasio!
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_2100_10:
At our base of operations in Jubilife Village, we
work hard and help each other out every day!
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_2200_10:
That’s completely different from the Team Galactic
we know...
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_2300_10: It would have been nice if they hadn’t changed...
episode_event_hisui_02/4003_1001_2400_10: Hey! Long time no see, Galaxy Expedition Team!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_0200_10: Rei! Akari! It’s so good to see you again!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_0600_10: So you two are Rei and Akari?
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_0700_10: You really do look like Lucas and Dawn.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_1000_10:
No...it’s nothing. You just look like someone
I know.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_1100_10: Yeah, she does look similar, doesn’t she?
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_1200_10:
Just as I expected! I’m glad I got to see your
shocked faces!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_1400_10:
Allow me to formally introduce myself.
I am Cynthia.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_1500_10:
I’m an archeologist researching myths about
Pokémon.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_1600_10:
I’ve heard a lot about you two from Adaman
and Irida.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_1700_10:
Cynthia wants to hear stories about our time...
Stories about the Hisui region.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_1800_10:
Even a story that means nothing to us could be
valuable in this era.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_1900_10: It’s funny how time flows, isn’t it?
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_2000_10:
Cynthia has some interesting stories too. This
strong-looking Pokémon is—
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_2400_10: Rei is a brilliant member of the Survey Corps!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_2600_10:
The first time we heard about Giratina, we were
both shocked.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_2700_10:
I couldn’t imagine there was a Pokémon who could
go toe-to-toe with mighty Palkia and Dialga!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_2900_10:
That reminds me: there are people here on Pasio
who understand mighty Dialga and Palkia, and
walk alongside them.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_3100_10: He’s formed a sync pair with mighty Dialga!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_3300_10:
Here on Pasio, a sync pair is a Pokémon and a
human whose hearts share a strong connection.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_3400_10:
We wanted to learn more about how people and
Pokémon could coexist...
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_3500_10: so we asked our Pokémon to stay in Poké Balls.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_3700_10:
Yeah. People and Pokémon in this era work in
harmony and help each other.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_3800_10:
We’ve realized that using Poké Balls isn’t wrong.
We can still coexist with Pokémon.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_4000_10:
Because of my experiences back in Hisui, I can
now believe it’s possible.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_4200_10: Then I’ll follow in your footsteps…
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_4300_10: and work hard as a sync pair!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_4400_10:
Me too! After all, I’m trying to become a worthy
opponent for Rei!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_4500_10: Both of you are so positive!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_4600_10: If you ever have any issues, we’ll help you out!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_4700_10:
Seems like we’re going to have more tough
sync pairs on Pasio.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_4800_10:
Oh, by the way! If you have a bit of time while
you hone your skills as sync pairs...
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_4900_10:
There’s still so many things we don’t know about
space-time distortions and rifts.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_5000_10:
I would appreciate it if you two would help me
with my research.
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_5100_10: Of course! We’d be happy to help!
episode_event_hisui_02/4004_1001_5200_10:
Leave it to us! Surveying is the Galaxy Expedition
Team’s specialty!
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_0200_10: Wow! You’re getting used to Pasio very quickly!
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_0300_10:
And you’re already using modern Poké Balls,
no problem!
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_0400_10: You’re really growing as a sync pair too!
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_0500_10:
I think some part of me still remembers being a
Trainer in the world I’m originally from—the one
I lived in before Hisui.
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_0600_10: My memories are fuzzy, but they’re there.
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_0700_10:
I see... It must be tough, being sent to different
worlds over and over again.
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_0800_10:
Yeah... It must be confusing, not knowing what
to do.
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_0900_10:
Yeah, it’s definitely confusing being sent to
another world again...but that won’t change
what I’m going to do.
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_1000_10:
In every world I’ve been in, people and Pokémon
live together, and everyone helps me out.
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_1100_10: I only met Decidueye because I went to Hisui.
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_1300_10:
I’m going to do what I can to help everyone to the
best of my ability!
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_1600_10: OK! Let’s get back to training!
episode_event_hisui_02/4005_1001_1700_10: All right! I’m gonna go even harder on you!
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_0200_10: Now, Pikachu! Let’s use our sync move!
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_0400_10:
That’s the kind of Poké Ball that’s used in the
Hisui region, right?
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_0500_10:
If I remember correctly, Rei said that sync stones
don’t work well with Hisuian Poké Balls.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_0600_10:
True. But my Pokémon are scared of these new
modern Poké Balls.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_0700_10:
I guess because a Poké Ball is meant to be like a
home for your Pokémon...
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_0800_10:
Maybe they’re comfortable in the Poké Balls you
made, and don’t want to leave them.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_0900_10:
They also seem to be confused by Pasio… It’s so
different from Hisui.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_1000_10:
I’ll never be able to take my first step as a
sync pair like this.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_1100_10:
It seems like Adaman and Irida’s Pokémon have
adapted to Pasio pretty quickly...
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_1200_10:
Even Rei’s Decidueye, and they’re all from
Hisui too.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_1400_10: Don’t worry, I’m sure that’s not it.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_1500_10:
Every Pokémon’s different, even if they’re from the
same place. So it makes sense that they’d adapt
differently too.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_1600_10:
Adaman and Irida also had trouble adjusting to life
on Pasio at first.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_1700_10: Time will solve everything, so no need to rush!
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_1900_10:
I said I would become a worthy opponent for him,
but he’s gone and surpassed me yet again...
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_2300_10:
I understand your feelings. You don’t want to
fall behind someone you helped mentor, right?
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_2500_10: I was a mentor to Dawn, and I taught her a lot...
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_2600_10:
But she got better at Pokémon battling than me
in no time.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_2800_10:
Yup! So before we start feeling sorry for
ourselves, let’s try our best!
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_2900_10:
Let’s get stronger together and show Rei and
Dawn what we can do!
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_3100_10:
That’s right! We have to show them that their
mentors still have what it takes!
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_3300_10:
Though I don’t think it’s a good idea to let
Pikachu and the others push themselves too hard...
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_3400_10:
How about this? While your Pokémon get used to
this new environment...
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_3500_10:
Why don’t you try getting to know a new
Pokémon?
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_3600_10: Though there aren’t any wild Pokémon on Pasio...
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_3800_10:
That’s it! I DO have a new Pokémon! I caught it in
a Pasio Poké Ball!
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_4000_10: I caught it in the space-time distortion.
episode_event_hisui_02/4006_1001_4100_10: Maybe I can form a sync pair with it!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_0100_10: Fight hard, everyone! Ahh, I wanna battle too!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_0200_10:
I wonder how much everyone has grown as
sync pairs.
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_0300_10: (I wonder what Pokémon Akari teamed up with...)
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_0700_10: Has it ever battled alongside Akari before?
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_0900_10:
Is that the one you caught in the space-time
distortion?!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_1100_10: I decided to become a sync pair with Samurott!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_1200_10:
Akari’s Samurott managed to get used to the
Poké Ball and Pasio’s environment very easily.
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_1300_10:
Since then, they’ve been growing fast as
a sync pair!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_1400_10: It was thanks to Lucas’s help!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_1500_10: Rei... Even in this new land with new friends…
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_1600_10: I’ll still aim to become a worthy opponent for you!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_1700_10:
No matter how far ahead you are...I’ll catch up to
you, I promise!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_1900_10:
Show us how strong you’ve gotten in this new
land, Akari!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_2000_10:
It seems that Akari has changed here on
Pasio, too.
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_2100_10: Yeah, we can’t fall behind either.
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_2200_10:
We’re more experienced than you two when it
comes to being a sync pair!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_2400_10: I feel the same way Akari does!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_2500_10: I won’t lose to you...as your mentor!
episode_event_hisui_02/4007_1001_2700_10:
Let’s not waste any time, and get on
with the battle!
episode_event_hisui_02/4008_1001_0600_10:
I’ve come to these ruins many times, but I’ve
never seen anything like it...
episode_event_hisui_02/4008_1001_0700_10:
It has a similar shine to a sync stone, but...
Let’s take it back and have a closer look.
episode_event_hisui_02/4008_1001_0800_10:
For some reason, Giratina has been interested in
this area for a while...
episode_event_hisui_02/4008_1001_0900_10: Maybe some sort of special power lurks here.
episode_event_hisui_02/4008_1001_1100_10: Yes, but these ruins aren’t even real.
episode_event_hisui_02/4008_1001_1200_10:
They were constructed and designed based on
ruins from different regions, but...
episode_event_hisui_02/4008_1001_1300_10:
You know, this place looks really similar to ruins I
saw in Hisui.
episode_event_hisui_02/4008_1001_1400_10: Is something the matter? Now Giratina’s acting up.
